website_summaries.verdict: The pull-up design will appeal to many women looking for a slimmer profile under clothing. We highly recommend this brand for postpartum incontinence and bleeding issues.
pros: We love how the fit and cut are similar to regular underwear
Pull-up design with no adhesive tabs
cons: Pad can separate from outer lining
Leakage may occur along leg seams

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for years and liked them BUT they are not the same. The last two purchases were TERRIBLE. The filling absolutely falls apart. They are not even packaged in the normal Depend brand wrapping. The panties are marked and color is different.
customer_reviews.author: Fire

customer_reviews.title: The last order I received was really bad. About half of them ripped after a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of orders were ok but then I noticed that a couple ripped after a little wear and I thought nothing of it. The last order I received was really bad. About half of them ripped after a couple hours of wear and a couple ripped while I was putting them on. It's like they are a generic brand of Depends. They appear to be thinner. I'm not satisfied with them at all. There are still 2 weeks till I receive the next order and I had to go out and buy a box to hold me over till the order got here.
customer_reviews.author: samia farhoud

customer_reviews.title: she is with the Lord know but I've got to say these diapers are really good, they hold a lot of pee
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this for my mom, she is with the Lord know but I've got to say these diapers are really good, they hold a lot of pee, as a matter of fact I use them when I have a cold and coughing or sneazing like crazy (yep, if you are a woman who have had kids, at certain age you can't holding it while coughing or sneazing hard) and they work like a charm :)
customer_reviews.author: EVA SUAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go by the ad package. Not the real product.
customer_reviews.text: These are not brand name depends. They came in a clear plastic bag that just said Depends, not in the thicker plastic with the trademark picture on the front. Not very absorbent. Well about half of the absorption of real product Depends. The first time I used one, the moisture ran down my jeans leg like there wasn’t anything in place to stop the urine. Ran clear down to my socks. With the real Depends, this hardy ever happens. The diaper from the real Depends does it’s job. This was a joke, on me. Excuse me while I was out my jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: EMBARRASSING LEAK DURING A BUSINESS MEETING
customer_reviews.text: LEAKED DURING A MEETING! I'm furious and embarrassed. What Happened To This Product? This has been my go-to for years. I could always trust it. NO LONGER. I was in a meeting, sneezed, and when I stood up there was a wet spot on the chair, and a leak-streak down my leg. There is not enough absorbent material between the legs. Also, I have experienced separation of the pad from the pant in the last two orders. Need to find another pant, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I've been using Depends for some time now. This order came packaged differently. It had clear plastic wrappers, not the Depends packaging. Already the side "seam" has ripped out on 4 pants. I never had this happen before. As I said, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Substitute Brand?
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these on a regular basis for my mom who lives long distance. Yesterday, my mom finally told me that this order contained a "substitute" brand. It was not what is pictured. (So watch out what that means when you read the portion that says "pictures may vary". My mom stated that these are flimsy, get cotton particles all over her clothing. We will not be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad with the negative reviews because I personally loved these and thought it was way better than the thick always disposable undies. I used it after I recently gave birth 3 weeks ago and it was thick enough but so comfortable and it also stretched and it stayed on and didn’t get loose on the waist after wearing it all day like the others did. I’ll definitely be purchasing more for the rest of the weeks to come for my postpartum recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney Aguas

customer_reviews.title: Not the product pictured on website
customer_reviews.text: What comes is not what is shown on the website. It is a knock-off by some unknown company and does not satisfy the usage. I sent this to someone who has bladder cancer. She has used Depends before and was pleased. These are not the product shown
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good absorbency, poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because it had good reviews online. Absorbency is good, at least comparable to, possibly better than, Always Discreet; that is something difficult for me to measure. However, the construction of Depend is shoddy, and it doesn't seem to hold together even for one day. The piece that attaches the absorbing material pulls away from the main structure of the pant. Also, little thread-like pieces pull away from the outside so that it seems to be shedding. For construction I recommend Always Discreet. For absorbency, both are good, Depend possibly better. It would be preferable to combine both qualities together.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A.

customer_reviews.title: Has the design changed?
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this product, from this vendor, for my elderly mother, for some time now. However, the product in the most recent shipment seems to be different. It looks like the brief has been redesigned and is quite skimpy, and my mother is not happy at all. I am going to have to look into alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dziejman

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great fit and absorbency.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I'm back on chemo so back to protective undies as anyone who has been on chemo can attest to. The medication does a number on bowel and bladder occassionally. Well I've tried several brands and styles within the brands. So far the Fit-Flex is my favorite for comfort, absorbency and fit. I even tried the new silhouette and prefer the fit-flex over them. It is also a much better value.
customer_reviews.author: D.Theriault

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Price
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 97 yr old mom. It took some convincing to get her to wear but she finally is on board. It's nice that they look more like panties than diapers. She says they are comfortable. We shopped around and these are the best price. We order at least 4 packages at a time so she doesn't get caught short. Amazon's fast delivery to the home is great.
customer_reviews.author: fishgirl

customer_reviews.title: This product is not good
customer_reviews.text: The Depends that I buy in stores and pharmacy are better quality. You can check of the design in the front is a deference. The absorption is not good. I think these Depends are generic and I would think it twice to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Coqui

customer_reviews.title: the underwear leaks
customer_reviews.text: I don't care if they are pretty, they leak around the leg holes and they don't absorb on the entire pad. The "elastic" around the leg hole is small and not tight so it caused me to have accidents. They are not Maximum absorbency either. So I had to change underwear more often making them more expensive than the brand I was using. Yes I am going back to my original brand that has more absorbency and better elastic around the leg area. So just because Depends are pretty doesn't help when one has wet pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: the fit was bad and when put to the test they failed big ...
customer_reviews.text: my wife is a small person weighs 120 and these are not small, the fit was bad and when put to the test they failed big time. Sorry I would not recomend for small person.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S

customer_reviews.title: ripped underwear
customer_reviews.text: I got this package of 52 however so far out of the 52 there have been about 8 that as soon as you put on they rip on the left side always the left side - like the package was defective or something - I don't think the left side was done correctly
customer_reviews.author: Fatima.Essa

customer_reviews.title: Postpartum hack
customer_reviews.text: I used these Depends for my postpartum recovery from childbirth. Everyone always says to "steal the mesh panties" from the hospital because they are so helpful. These went well beyond the comfort and absorbency of the hospital underwear. These were perfect for everyday where when I was recovering and helped not only with the bleeding, but with the temporary incontinence brought on by childbirth.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme B.

customer_reviews.title: Safe, secure, comfortable protection.
customer_reviews.text: Tried most all of similar products but Depends fit the best, comfortable, absorbency & one of only two I have tried that do not itch or irritate my skin even though worn daily for over a year. The flex-fit really does make them even better than they were before. Another really great aspect of Depends is that you do not have all that extra panty bulk as in the other brands i have tried. Depends are as close as you will get to feeling like you are wearing regular panties. Very safe secure protection day after day.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Veltri

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get my money's worth out of one of the bags because they were defected
customer_reviews.text: Not very fair because this is about one bag out of 2 bags that I got in this shipment and I bought and them before and been very happy with them the 1st bag I opened almost all of them ripped at the top of the pad so I had to keep changing them because the pad was ripped all the way across to and I just kept in the 1 maybe do you learn to do that but then the 2nd batch I opened the bag it didn't do that so I just got a bum bag and it was very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Love the new small size.
customer_reviews.text: I order these every month for my sister who is incontinent. The new small size is a much better fit for her (92 lbs) than the small/medium size we had to buy before.
customer_reviews.author: I B

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Depend-Fit Flex is a total knock-off. There is absolutely NO elastic after wearing them for a few hours. I am canceling my subscription. They did not come in the usual packaging which should have been my first clue. I would give it a minus score if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Leah B.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same ones as in the stores!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on-line thinking they were a great price compared to what I pay in the store. Unfortunately, they were NOT the same item as what I got in the store although the package is exactly the same. They didn't fit the same either. Much smaller although I ordered exactly the same size I always wear. Luckily, as always amazon stands by there promise and refunded me my entire purchase upon return of the item. I wish it could have worked out though because they were nice diapers and the price was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Sooty

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! I used to use Depends until they changed years ago. I bought these because Amazon is jerking me around on others. THESE ARE TERRIBLE! They are practically bikini cut, little coverage. Have jell like material that, when wet, is GREASY and BREAKS UP, SPILLING, etc. CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP!!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: SRmazon Customer SR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for postpartum
customer_reviews.text: I got these for postpartum care after reading lots of blogs that recommended them. I’m so glad I did. No one warned me incontinence was common after giving birth (I bought them for bleeding but that wasn’t even my issue!) These are really comfortable and absorbent. Honestly even better than the giant pads from the hospital. Highly recommend. (I normally wear a 2X in pants And got the XL, they fit great and would definitely fit up to 3X or 4X).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sharon Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not the genuine silhouette.
customer_reviews.text: These are inferior to the ones illustrated .They must be a generic or created just for Amazon. The material is scratchy and On two occasions a fresh pair leaked all over.I made the mistake of ordered more before the wet experience and when it arrives it wii go right back
customer_reviews.author: Bette Spagel

customer_reviews.title: New design
customer_reviews.text: While it may not be important to many, there are those of us that care for persons with dementia. It took me the better part of a year to convince my loved one that the black mark goes in the back. You have now printed a design on the front and now I have to argue and struggle with every changing that the designs go in the front. Just adds to my daily frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: S for shi*y
customer_reviews.text: And if you're looking for discretion, forget it. Not only is the product size printed all over the box, but the box doesn't entirely seal leaving a gap wide enough to VERY EASILY discern what's inside. So, everybody knows I use Depends and what size I wear. Gee thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Junkie Doll

customer_reviews.title: Depends cutting corners ?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what happened to depends. The underpants used to stretch and be really strong, but the last ones I got kept tearing on the sides. Another thing different is they came in clear bags instead of the pink or whatever, which is no big deal to me, but got me wondering whether or Not they were trying to cut costs. I think I’m switching to another brand. It’s not a good experience when your underwear rips in to.
customer_reviews.author: Very, very unsatisfied customer! Lost $70!

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but don't always do the job.  I'll have to try another brand,
customer_reviews.text: I would think that these underwear with so much padding would always be absorbent enough so there would be no embarrassing accidents. In the daytime, they're OK. They are roomy and comfortable. But first thing in the morning, after 8 hours of sleep, I can't get to the bathroom in time before there is a flood. A serious flood that runs down my legs and wets my pajamas and my slippers, and even leaves a trail on the bathroom floor. This is not the way I want to start my morning. mopping up the floor, wearing wet clothes and slippers that have to be put in the wash immediately. No more Depends for me!
customer_reviews.author: Theophilos

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Order Wtong
customer_reviews.text: They need work on the back tape and the quality of the mesh inner liner. This is the first time I ordered the pink ones. I have always worn the regular neutral color. I noticed the back tape on those needs to be increased. I have to wear these and I wish they would improve these two areas. This is the second time I am adding to this review. Don't like the pink because of the quality, order the original neutral color and got blue ones! I hope the quality on these is better.
customer_reviews.author: Sally armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Must have for postpartum care
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my best purchases I made to help me with my postpartum hygiene. So much better than using maxi pads and mesh underwear.
customer_reviews.author: salade122

customer_reviews.title: depends not this time
customer_reviews.text: This version of depends I didn't feel as comfortable with this product as the ones your company sells in your stores . The maximum absorption want of the same degree, the ones in the stores are stronger than this . I was disappointed that these were not. I know depends is a good product but this time , they didn't meet my needs. I would buy again, but through your local carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie chris

customer_reviews.title: A Real Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: I forced my wife to try them out just once. Now, she loves them. After many bouts with chemo and radiation treatments over many years it has left her plumbing difficult to control. Not anymore. She tells me these particular panties have changed her life for the best. Especially when she wants to go to movies or other functions that makes it more difficult to just get up and go.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Autodeliver does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I had a subscription to deliver this product and another to be delivered every two months. The last delivery was April 19. When I tried to add a third product, I received the other product and the new product on June 24, but this product was not delivered at all. Apparently, the other product was substituted for this product, instead of shipping three products at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Old Whitebeard

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE FIT & VERY ABSORBENT
customer_reviews.text: I tried various types of incontinence underwear and find this style of Depends to be perfect for me. Typically, upon getting up in the morning, I am not able to get to the bathroom in time. This underwear saves my bed linen and my night clothes. It fully absorbs liquid without losing so much as a drop. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNHAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I received my replacement last night. The first time and this I received M med max. I ordered F med nighttime. I cannot believe the same error has been made twice. The 1st order was pu yesterday from UPS. PLEASE replace this 2nd box w female, medium, nighttime. Have UPS pickup at my door. Gate code 42345. Unit 209
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R Lemon

customer_reviews.title: NOT for true Incontinence !!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have true incontinence this is NOT the right underwear. if you only need something for 2 ounces max this is your product. But if you have true issues try Tena instead, it holds much more liquid and is very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Eshelman

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size small and the fit is perfect. I’ve had absolutely no problems with seams splitting as other reviews state. They aren’t bulky and cannot be detected under leggings. I had tried another brand and found they leaked. These do not leak. They’re very practical for me especially at night when I have a difficult time getting to the bathroom on time because I’m disabled. No complaints here. Will definitely be ordering again and again!
customer_reviews.author: avidreaderinwi

customer_reviews.title: are they seconds?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second order I bought. The first ones I noticed the padding on the left side wasn't as close to the edge as the right side by 1/2 inch. I thought it was just that batch and ordered again. Upon checking it's the same. By not having the padding going as far over, it sometimes causes leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Tear too easily
customer_reviews.text: I was a suscriber to these for quite a while now but the last few batches have been awful. They tear down the seams and if you aren't at home you're in a mess. I had to tape them with duct tape a few times so they would not fall off. I'm wondering if the ones sold on Amazon are rejects or defective ones.
customer_reviews.author: carol a walsh

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: We received the new fit depends. They are horrible. Not like the old depends at all!
customer_reviews.author: GumboGirl68

customer_reviews.title: BRING BACK THE OLD DEPENDS!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the designed Depends; they don’t fit right. They seem skimpy & don’t fit around the groin area tight enough when there is diarrhea!! They’re ok if it’s just urine. They have a low cut fit. If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it!!! I looked back to my old orders to buy the unadorned Depends, but I guess you aren’t making those any more. Go back to the plain depends that fit sooo much better & really protect when there is diarrhea!!
customer_reviews.author: Leaner

customer_reviews.title: Someone else might give this product a five star review
customer_reviews.text: I seem to have a negative reaction to something in the product. I developed what I might name a "diaper rash" I will add the remainder of the box to whatever is next donated to the homeless facility in town.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline V.

customer_reviews.title: Qualify as fraud, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE TOTALLY DIFFERENT FROM SAME PRODUCT I'VE ORDERED FOR SOME TIME. THEY ARE FLIMSIER, THINNER, LIGHTER, DIFFERENT AND MUCH MORE CHEAPLY MADE IN EVERY WAY. AMAZON SHOULD STOP CARRYING THEM, IT'S LIKE FRAUD. DON'T BUY THEM, COMPLETE RIPOFF!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Side seem rips
customer_reviews.text: 8 time out of 10 the side seem would rip, of the 48 at least 8 to 10 were lost because the side seem ripped. Me wife has used this type of Depends for several years and has never had a problem until purchasing these. AS they came packaged with nothing to indicate that they were first quality Depend I would guess that these are seconds that Depend will not sell commercially, given the lack of Depend normal quality. The cheaper price is very misleading given the number of underwear that were lost because of poor quality. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: bill22

customer_reviews.title: No designs.. What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these several times. Both as large orders and in the smaller packages. This last order didn't come with any which had the designs on them, only a single dot on the back. Tried to get my mom (who these were for) to understand why her 'pretty' panties no longer looked the way she liked. I hope this next batch is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Littlecelt

customer_reviews.title: My mom is not a man
customer_reviews.text: Being that I can't go out and these are hard to find in the stores, I decided ordered my mom's Depends, size large. I was so disappointed when I opened the box and see Depends for men, size XL. My mom is going through treatment and they are a must so I did a double order. Now I am face with sending them back and waiting another 15 days for them or trying to figure out how to make these work. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product used to be uniformly great quality and thick, very absorbent. HOWEVER ... this newest shipment we deceived was completely unacceptable. The color and design had changed, the pad was thinner, and worse yet, the legholes were stuck together and had to be carefully separated. This yielded paper tears which exposed the granular acrylamide filling.
customer_reviews.author: RTCough

customer_reviews.title: Great product recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Only product I use is depends does all it claims very good Delivery excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fit
customer_reviews.text: These were awful. The seams were sewn on the wrong side to begin with. The fit was awful. Got a medium. They could have fit someone extra large. The pad was all crunched in the center and didn't even lay flat when wearing. It was like a babies diaper hanging like it was soaked, and this was when I first put it on. I will never recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Littleflwers

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend these
customer_reviews.text: Ran out of ones from hospital and opened these. These are not in a depends green bag. These are Not anything like the depends I have used prior. These are supposed to be a medium. VERY SMALL and do not stretch very easy. Also the beautiful flower print looks like scribble. So disappointed. I have opened these and doubt I can return. Do not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mjd3

customer_reviews.title: Inferior not true depends.
customer_reviews.text: First box was great. Absorbent and very comfortable. Next box not as good. Each one after I would rate 1 star. Very poor quality . Quit ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: When they say XL they mean XL. I'm 210 lbs and they are very large. I could have purchased the large for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Changed!
customer_reviews.text: My 99 year old mother has been wearing these for years but the last 2 packages have been thinner and even if she doesn’t wet them, they fall apart after a days use! The interior padding melts from her body heat (and she is cold-natured) and falls to the floor when being pulled down. The outer fabric tears easily! Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe's Mom

customer_reviews.title: How can a big company like this make such crap and hope to rely on ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not order these pants. They say size waist 38- 56. They don't even come up to your waist. They only reach your hips and come off during the night. How can a big company like this make such crap and hope to rely on their brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Erna Breen

customer_reviews.title: Depends product
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the depends that I ordered.The product did not fit right as they had in the past ! They were cut too high on sides and became very baggy and useless . I paid a lot for this item and now I can't use them ...I'm on a fixed income and I can't use them ....what a waste ! I've tried using 5 of them and now I probably have to get rid of them and try another brand...sorry to complain as I've been satisfied in the past . Thank you,Bonnie Breen
customer_reviews.author: bonita

customer_reviews.title: Not as dependable as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for an elderly lady that lives with me and that I care for. I figured with these being depends, and such a well known and widely recognized brand, they would be worth the value that I paid. I was disappointed after the first day we opened the packaging. They are maximum absorbency but leaked very badly at night. She went through as many of this brand as she did the cheap brand we would purchase at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Chitty

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate product
customer_reviews.text: Completely disliked these Depends. In adequate product. Horrible fit. Leg opening way too big. It creeps or reaches up to my waist. Most uncomfortable fit. Will never order these again. I must learn to read reviews before ordering items. Nothing good about these Depends
customer_reviews.author: Lillian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great easy way to protect emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I like the pants idea and the convenience of sizes. The only thing that I found was the inconvenience of having to get undressed in order to get the pants off. Sometimes I did experience of leakage on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Drinker

customer_reviews.title: Delivered to wrong house
customer_reviews.text: The big box had the right items but was delivered to the wrong house. Must be a new driver as I've not had any problems till recently. Two other packages were not left on the deck but were put on the side of the house in an overhang/storage area. Not a big deal but I did have to haul the last big box a little ways and I'm old. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: These literally disintegrate when wet. I have been purchasing similar products for my patient, so I know what to expect .I bought these because of the price, as well as the Depend name. These are nothing like the Depends I've purchased in the past. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET YOUR ORDERS RIGHT !!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered extra large You sent me large !!! I don't know what changed but I can't use large on my mother THEY DON'T FIT
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are for my mom. We had to go to another brand. Every 90 minute test. They just don't work. At this size " other brands do." ? So . Can I give another product name? If I get a response I'll try that. This is the worst we've tried but the most available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They come apart when removing them to go bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: You need an extra pair to take with you because they pretty much fall apart when need to remove them and you can not put them back on because they are torn apart. I have bought these for months and never had a problem but this is the third package that has done this. I think I need to find another brand. Shocked !!
customer_reviews.author: Dangereous shopper

customer_reviews.title: Don't hold
customer_reviews.text: I totally dislike this product, I got this because I had to have knee surgery and someone recommended this BUT I've had several accidents and it did not hold up to be as described.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Has the price doubled? Listing has changed...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering these for my mom for a while now. Until recently, a single order was listed as “2 of Depend FIT-FLEX Incontinence Underwear for Women, Disposable, Maximum Absorbency, M, Blush, 56 Count”, i.e. 112 per order. As of today, though, the product listing has changed to a single pack of 56. Is anyone else seeing this change?
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Y

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: You did notes d me the right items. There were only 28 items in the package and I opened them so it was to late to Return them. The package looked the same. You still charged me the same price as usual. Please don't do that again.order these every month a depend on them Thank you Helen streit
customer_reviews.author: helenstreit

customer_reviews.title: Great at night for menstruation
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to use at night (recently started her menstrual cycle), which has saved her panties and sheets. She says they're comfortable, despite being a bit embarrassed (at first) about wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: but I've had many packages now and they are all like that. Mine come in a ready ship package ...
customer_reviews.text: These have a grayish tinge to them rather than the bright coral color I usually get with the Depends. I thought the first package or two that I got would just be a fluke, but I've had many packages now and they are all like that. Mine come in a ready ship package max xl 48 count. Color is not that important, but it just has a dirty look to it.
customer_reviews.author: SRB

customer_reviews.title: That Depend Fit Flex are very absorbcrnt
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten a smaller size, but they still worked really well. I use them because I have a problem holding my urine. I got tired of wetting my pants.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT MY DAY!!!!.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy on all counts. They leak up the back and around the legs. Too high around the belly button I used the best on the new chart.Can you offer anything else. I am 90 years old and have osteoporosis.scoliosis spinal stenosis.
customer_reviews.author: Angels Peak !!!

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if it came in original packaging and not clear bags
customer_reviews.text: I love the pull ups for my mom but I don't know why they didnt send it in the original packaging with the depends brand on it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Depends
customer_reviews.text: I have had to use these since I have had several strokes and a few other health problems. Can’t run to the bathroom as I once did. So these help me get through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are not actually depends, these are counterfeit. The color is wrong, the absorbency is absolutely terrible to nonexistent! The people who state what the mark on the panty is on the original (real) and the counterfeit is accurate - the fake has the wrong marking on it. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Depends
customer_reviews.text: The product is very comfortable. I no longer have concerns about incontinence during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while I was pregnant for my postpartum recovery not knowing if I would end up using them but they are Soo much more comfortable then wearing a pad and underwear. Love how high waisted they are too.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: AVOID HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! These fell apart when removing them to change a wet diaper. Clumps of the filling was everywhere.That was horrible. It made the floor wet and it got everywhere. The first time I wore them they were great. What happened?
customer_reviews.author: Tamela

customer_reviews.title: changed for the worse
customer_reviews.text: these used to be nice but the price has not gone down just the quality. the material is so thin they rip so easily and the absorbancy is so bad you may as well be wearing regular underwear. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny from PA

customer_reviews.title: Very Absorbing and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This item runs large buy next size down unless u have larger then usual hips.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: The 'fit' seems to have changed since the last time I ordered these.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size that I bought before and these are gigantic! Mis-marked maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Welch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and discreet
customer_reviews.text: I am too young to need to use these, but no one knows. They are comfortable and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaH

customer_reviews.title: not overnight or absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Legs are too loose and I couldn't go to the bathroom without leaks and running up my cheeks to my back
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Harris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Always discreet works better. These leak horribly. Definitely not maximum absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: A&T

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: the stretchability doesn't seem as good as before. It detaches in crucial parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ila Mae Stensland

customer_reviews.title: Don't mess with a good item .
customer_reviews.text: it was a good item if u cant make it better don't make it worse. Do the old ones still exist somewhere ? Can I buy them somewhere else ? Disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: daisy hunjan

customer_reviews.title: ... mother who has mobility issues & they do a great job. She reports they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these for my elderly mother who has mobility issues & they do a great job. She reports they are comfortable, absorbent, & are just the thing when she can't make it to the bathroom in time or has a little leakage. She really appreciates the 48 count package as opposed to only the 19 count she can buy in her local drug store.
customer_reviews.author: spike

customer_reviews.title: Size a little smaller than wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was labeled as xl but I believe they were only a large size. I compared to the ones I already had and the one I received were a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Galanakos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it bunches up in the crouch area and thus leaks. Moreover, there is no way this is something you'd wear to the gym. It looks like a loaded diaper. I can wear it on short trips to the grocery store, for example, or overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves!
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves these & they make her feel like she’s wearing real underwear
customer_reviews.author: Yoga2574

customer_reviews.title: Sized Small!
customer_reviews.text: Large was much more like a Medium Having to snip sides at waist and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. MIller

customer_reviews.title: Over-advertised. Not absorbent. Constant change
customer_reviews.text: DEPENDS iS WIDELY SOLD/WIDELY ADVERTISED/ BUT AN EXPENSIVE Diaoer definitely NOT great. ...DOES NOT ABSORB MUCH..can’t last very long... just OVER Featured on TV./SHOPS./EVERYWHERE but definitely have to use 3 for every ONE OF “LIV DRY“. DIAPERS. (DEPENDS Advertising is overkill )
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Mother didn't want to wear these, but age took its toll. She wears a size 20 or 22, so the XL fits her nicely. Although unsteady on her feet and dependent on a walker, she's able to get these up easily. They work for her day and night. She finds 3-4 pair are needed daily. They whisk away moisture and serve her well. She's tried all the other brands, including store brands. These do the best at feeling natural and dry.
customer_reviews.author: WeimMom

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My wife is incontinent. Store bought depends are simply not the quality received with this product. Life is much easier for my wife and myself due to the maximum absorbancy and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Scheer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my son with special needs who outgrew Pullups
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 10 yr old son. He weighs about 110 lbs and outgrew the GoodNites XL pullups. Mens adult underwear are still too big. These are perfect. The color is fine - more fleshy than pink. Will be ordering again! And, they are almost half the price of the pullups we were using.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anderson LLC

customer_reviews.title: Clearly a fraudulent product!
customer_reviews.text: Having MS sucks. Having to wear depends as a 56yr old woman really sucks. Receiving products through Amazon with no quality control totally, frustratingly maddeningly sucks!!!! !! i Like many others have stated, have been buying online for a few years now and up until recently it was great. Whatever was sent to me last time must have been the rejects during manufacturing!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great for elder care!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my elderly mother in law. They are easy to get on and off of her as they rip down the side to get them off.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Amason sells a good product.
customer_reviews.text: For anyone, young or teen who must use these pads, Depends is and excellent product, I will continue to purchase them from Amazon. Why? Their prices are excellent and they always have some availiable.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Haase

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfort was fair Absorbency was very poor. Paddiing actually clumping and breaking down after a couple of hours. Not even full coverage.I am hoping this product was an imposter and if not, i will no longer be purchasing any Depends product. I will try 1 more time.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth meddis

customer_reviews.title: Thin support
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother said is very thin & it's not of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter free

product_meta.title: Depend FIT-FLEX Incontinence & Postpartum Underwear for Women, Disposable, Maximum Absorbency, Small, Blush, 60 Count (2 Packs of 30) (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Size:Small| Style:Depend FIT-FLEX UnderwearReclaim and reconnect with what matters most in your life with Depend FIT-FLEX Women’s Incontinence Underwear providing Your Best Comfort and Protection Guaranteed.* Featuring a beautiful blush color and three feminine designs, this disposable underwear is ideal for bladder incontinence or postpartum underwear. Extremely soft, yet strong, material instantly locks in wetness and odors, helping to keep you dry and worry-free with Trusted Protection. A comfortable, underwear-like fit - the SureFit waistband helps keep the briefs in place and the form-fitting elastic strands provide a smooth, discreet fit under clothing, unlike bulky adult diapers. Unscented absorbent incontinence underwear is natural rubber latex-free, lotion-free and fragrance-free. Underwear is soft, quiet and breathable. Depend FIT-FLEX for Women in Maximum Absorbency is available in four sizes - size small (24-30 inch waist), size medium (31-37 inch waist), size large (38-44 inch waist) and size extra-large (45-64 inch waist). Depend adult incontinence supplies always ship in a discreet box and are FSA-eligible in the U.S. Packaging may vary from images shown.*If you're not completely satisfied with the fit of your Depend, we can help. Purchase by 3/1/21. Mail in by 3/15/21. Online access required. Limit 1 per household. Original receipt/UPC required. Restrictions apply. See Depend website for details.
feature_bullets: Incontinence underwear with maximum absorbency, odor control and soft, flexible fabric is Your Best Comfort and Protection Guaranteed*
Material absorbs immediately, keeping you dry and protected from bladder leaks so you can go about your day, worry-free
Form-fitting elastic strands for a smooth, discreet fit under clothes that are flexible to move with you, unlike bulky adult diapers
Unbelievably soft incontinence or postpartum underwear, now in a beautiful blush color with three new feminine designs, and SureFit waistband for a comfortable, underwear-like fit
Depend adult incontinence products always ship in a discreet box; FSA-eligible in the U.S.; Packaging may vary from image shown

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
